name: Kajol S Mehetre
title: VR & Simulation Engineer | AI-Enthusiast | Interactive Systems Developer
tagline: Building immersive experiences at the intersection of Virtual Reality and Artificial Intelligence
about: I’m a STEM professional passionate about building immersive VR and AR experiences that merge simulation, AI, and real-world applications. With 4+ years of experience, I develop interactive virtual environments, create physics-driven simulation pipelines, and implement AI-enhanced systems for testing, training, and visualization. My work bridges research and engineering, transforming 3D assets, digital twins, and simulation data into reliable, scalable, and engaging experiences. I specialize in Unity-based simulation, NVIDIA Isaac Sim, Python automation, and photogrammetry-driven workflows — all aimed at pushing the boundaries of interactive technology.
